Method Detail

callStoredQuery

public static java.sql.ResultSet callStoredQuery(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                                 java.lang.String name,
                                                 java.lang.Object[] params)
                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
call a stored procedure that return a Resultset 
 the stored procedure must be designed for return a resultset
 and the input parameter must be only of IN type , the OUT and INOUT parameters
 are not currently supported.





Parameters:
conn - database connection
name - store procedure name
params - stored procedure parameter ( only IN parameter accepted )

Returns:
ResultSet

Throws:

java.sql.SQLException

callStoredUpdate

public static java.lang.Object callStoredUpdate(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                                java.lang.String name,
                                                java.lang.Object[] params,
                                                int sqlResultType)
                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
execute stored procedure for update command

Parameters:
conn - database connection
name - store procedure name
params - stored procedure parameter ( only IN parameter accepted )
sqlResultType - sql types of result ( if you aren't interested to result use: Types.NULL )
Returns:
the stored procedure result
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
